text: I know our walls our thin, but it sounds like next door are shouting at me. I even flinched when something crashed!

text: Why do God botherers hang around on the doorstep so long. They must realise we're not going to answer coz we told the 4year old to come away

text: When I was little I thought school summer holidays went on for months, now I understand they just feel like it! Roll on September!

author: Bels
text: So the baby has finally decided that walking is actually for him. That & screaming!

author: Bels
text: The next person that tells me that getting made redundant might be for the best can bloody poke it too! It paid my bills, let me wallow ffs

text: Hopefully won't be made redundant later on today #fingerscrossed

text: My poor baby keeps letting go of the sofa and trying to take steps. As he can't actually walk yet, he just falls flat :( #nopainnogain

author: Bels
text: Woke up an couldn't move my neck or head. Freaked out!! Eventually realised that my hair had got tangled in my bra hook. #relief #idiot

author: Bels
text: Is not friends with the baby at the mo :( He's hot a lot of teeth coming through & keeps biting me. #breastfeeding

author: Bels
text: My 4 year old has better manners than some adults.

author: Bels
text: Actually HATE tits that think they & whoever they're walking with should have all the path, when I'm struggling with buggy & 4year old #rude

author: Bels
text: Looking for tips on how to keep a 9month old happy/quiet during a wedding...

author: Bels
text: Traffic in Dunstable is shocking, avoid if possible

author: Bels
text: Don't ask me a question, then moan when you don't like tone I answer it in. #grumpytit

author: Bels
text: Have just been refunded the money for an item I still have & they've refunded a load of points too. #oops #result

author: Bels
text: Husband just got in from work with the right arse! If I acted like that he'd be muttering something about the time of the month #grumpytit

author: Bels
text: I have spent the day looking like a sticky person that's had a fit in a charity shop. How do you dress for this mad weather?!

author: Bels
text: Shattered. Boobies drained, both boys finally asleep, I'm having a sit down & a cider. #isitfridayyet?

author: Bels
text: My friends neighbour said to her "you think they'd be able to do something about all this horrible weather!" Really?! #wtf

author: Bels
text: Just saw the Olympic torch. Don't know what I expected but was a little disappointed. The police and the coke van got the biggest cheer!

author: Bels
text: Huge respect for vegans, but even the plants are carnivorous in our house. http://t.co/SpFdivRG

author: Bels
text: Will be spending the day trying to catch flys and bugs for Sam's new carnivorous plant.

author: Bels
text: Edds on a stag do, I get the remote to myself and there's naff all to watch. #shittv

author: Bels
text: Listening to Dad try and guess the next word on the phonics song #simpleton

author: Bels
text: Recommend the Swedish film version of the girl with the dragon tattoo! #GWTDT

author: Bels
text: Been watching the girl with the dragon tattoo, original Swedish version. There's about 40mins left but can't keep awake any longer.

author: Bels
text: Just put Sam to bed & he asked me why I wasn't cross when the old man kicked a puddle at him. Wish I'd seen him do it! #verycrossmummy

author: Bels
text: What is the point jumping the lights at a crossing in Dunstable! You'll get caught at the next lot, FFS there are kids crossing #arseholes

author: Bels
text: I told Sam not to walk with his coat over his face & he told me not to go on! Then he walked into the lamppost #cheekyboy  #mumknowsbest

author: Bels
text: Heard the baby wake up, so went to bring him downstairs & was greeted with a massive roar as he lunged at me. #babythinkshesadinosaur

author: Bels
text: Hate when the tit behind the till is so busy on the phone they can't even tell you how much it comes to #badmanors #pokeyourbusiness

author: Bels
text: Some women think they are too classy to watch porn, yet they'll read the f*** out of it! #shadesofgrey

author: Bels
text: Not sure if it's worth taking the boys (aged 9months & 4 years), to watch the Olympic torch Monday morning. Anyone seen it? #OlympicTorch

author: Bels
text: Watched the australian film 'the square' it's a thriller with a cool twist. #worthawatch

author: Bels
text: Got a cuddle from my mum when I picked the kids up, can't remember the last time she cuddled me without a prompt #cantbeatamumcuddle

author: Bels
text: Almost cooked @StephenTootill1 a pizza without taking the polystyrene disc off the bottom #happenedbefore #willhappenagain

author: Bels
text: Come on Italy #Euro2012

author: Bels
text: Found my 4 year old son & his 3 year old gal pal running round giggling, naked from the waist down. #toomuchchocolate

author: Bels
text: Dunstable Icknield lower school summer fete today, burr st. Dunstable, 12 until 3. Come along & show your support whilst having some fun!

author: Bels
text: Love when my baby is full of titty milk, he looks like he's drunk. #breastfeeding

author: Bels
text: Does anyone know how to get rid of earwigs? Preferably child friendly because they've moved into the playhouse :( #pests

author: Bels
text: I know town is getting rough, but you can now buy disco biscuits in the shops! #whatevernext http://t.co/ollZX1IN

author: Bels
text: Loosing my rag with these PPI phone calls, I know it just their job but #do1

text: There is nothing mild or gentle about fairy washing up liquid #handsthatdodishes #sorehands

text: Tennis does nothing for me

author: Bels
text: Both boys up at half 5, wouldn't mind so much if they'd had enough sleep and were in good moods. #longdayahead

author: Bels
text: Playing angry birds whilst breast feeding became a problem when I tried to curl a slipper round @StephenTootill1  #breastfeeding #angrybirds

author: Bels
text: Nearly died when Sam shouted at the top of his voice, "mummy, look at that dogs big, pink balls!"

author: Bels
text: Have worked out what the strange noise I keep hearing is... Jake's grinding his big bottom tooth against 2 tiny top teeth.

author: Bels
text: Up again at 5 :(

text: Been making donations to @EastAngliAirAmb when I make a purchase on eBay, also donating 10% of any sales I make.
